Codemixed_Question: Hi doctor, Mere neck ke right hand side mein unilateral submandibular lymph node swelling hai.Kripya dekhiye neck mein hone wali kuch cheeze. Teeno kursiyon ke baad antibiotics (Augmentin do dose aur Clindamycin ek dose), mujhe ek aur ultrasound ke liye refer kiya gaya tha. Ye ultrasound scan dikhaya ki lymph node 3 cm ho gaya hai lekin abhi tak mojud hai. Toh doctor ne FNAC order kiya. Iske results aa gaye hai aur metastasis ka koi sign nahi hai ya TB lymphadenopathy ka koi sign nahi hai. Doctor ne dobara Doxycycline ke antibiotics ka course suggest kiya hai aur lymph node ka measurement teen hafte baad remeasure karane ko kaha hai. FNAC mein kaha gaya hai ki yeh inflammatory lymph node hai. Kya iska matlab hai reactive lymph node. Aur kya aur koi cheez iska karan ho sakti hai.

Codemixed_Question: Hello doctor, maine do teen mahine pehle ek sex worker ke saath unprotected sex kiya tha. Do mahine baad mujhe ARS ke lakshan hone lage, thakan, dast, chakkar, gala dard aur muh mein kuch samasya. Kripya doctor, neeche diye gaye muh ko dekhe. Bas ek din pehle maine ek sex worker ke saath protected sex kiya tha, lekin mera ling poori tarah se tanavit nahin tha aur gehre andar nahi gaya tha. Isliye mujhe lagta hai ki vagina se sampark ho sakta hai, lekin main yaad nahin kar pa raha hoon, confirm nahin hai. Lekin usne mujhe unprotected blow job ya oral sex kiya tha. Do din baad maine p24 antibody combo test karaya tha jo negative tha. Kuch din baad maine DNA PCR karaya tha jo negative tha. Pehle exposure ke 11 hafte baad maine western blot karaya tha jo negative tha. Pehle exposure ke 12 hafte baad maine CMIA rapid test karaya tha jo negative tha. Do din baad, maine HIV 1 aur 2 ke liye RNA PCR karaya tha jo negative tha. Ye dusre exposure ke 30 din baad tha. Chhe hafte baad maine antibody p24 combo CMIA test karaya tha jo negative tha. Mere paas abhi bhi thakan, zyada thuk, gala dard jaise lakshan hain. Main bahut chintit hoon. Kripya batayein ki mere tests sahi hai ya nahi. Main ne padha hai ki kuch log late seroconvert hote hain aur mujhe chinta ho rahi hai. Aur ek aur vyakti jiska mujhe status nahi pata, uske bhi roz dast, chakkar, muh mein kuch samasya aur pair dard hai. Kripya madad karein.

Maine Diclofenac epolamine 65 mg capsule, Glucosamine sulfate capsule aur pain relief gel liya. Mere doctor ne mujhe ek mahine tak ye medicines recommend ki hai aur kisi physiotherapy program ko suggest nahi kiya hai. Unhone bus mujhe bataya hai ki normal tareeke se chalna theek hai. Mera sawaal yeh hai ki, kya yeh kuch normal hai jab bhi mein apne legs ka istemal karti hoon ya yeh koi complication hai. Aapke sujhav aur precautions kya hai. Kya mujhe rest karna chahiye ya normal tareeke se ghoomna chahiye. Agar rest karna hai toh kitne time tak karna chahiye. Main ek bahut active person hoon aur mujhe chinta hai ki cheezein kharab ho rahi hai. Toh kya mujhe physiotherapy program shuru karna chahiye ya phir mujhe ek mahine tak medicines lete rehna chahiye.

Kya ye summer rash hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Inmein koi rasayan nahi hai. Mujhe bukhar ya dard nahi hai. Aur ye mujhe pehli baar ho raha hai abhi.
summary: What could be the cause of itchy skin color bumps appearing on legs, hips, and hands during peak summer? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Codemixed_Question: Mere left shin par ek chota hard lump hai. Doctor, please patient ki image ko dekhiye neeche It is not visible lekin aap ise feel kar sakte hain jab aap apni haath ko shin bone par ghise. Is par dabav ke samay dard nahi hota hai. Main ise pichle kuch mahino mein hi notice kiya hai aur yeh gayab nahi ho raha hai. Kya aap mujhe bata sakte hain ki yeh kya ho sakta hai aur mujhe kise dikhana chahiye.
summary: What could be causing a small, hard lump on the left shin that doesn't hurt and hasn't resolved in months? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. The skin has become folded and turned red.

Codemixed_Question: Mujhe do din pehle stomach upset hua tha aur maine raat ko Norflox-tz liya tha. Jab subah utha toh mujhe apne upper lip par andar se sujhan notice hua. Doctor, kripya affected area ki image dekhein. Mujhe headache bhi tha. Main ne turant medicine lena band kar diya. Headache toh dopahar tak thik ho gaya lekin lip sujhewan abhi bhi hai. Ab kal se mujhe mouth mein kuch problem hai aur mouth lining bahut dry aur red hai. Is par koi sujhao ya salaah ho toh bataiye.
summary: Patient experienced stomach upset after taking Norflox-tz, followed by swelling on upper lip, headache, mouth ulcer, dry, red lining. Advice? The image shows the condition of swollen eye.  Little swelling on the lateral side of the right eye's eyelid.
